amendment.description: To provide for certain conditions on the export to China of crude oil from the Strategic Petroleum Reserve.

action.text: Amendment SA 5265 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 5265 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 54 - 46. Record Vote Number: 311.
Point of order that the amendment violates section 4106, H. Con. Res. 71, 115th Congress, raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 5265.

Amendment SA 5265 proposed by Senator Cruz to Amendment SA 5194. (consideration: CR S4191-4192; text: CR S4191) To provide for certain conditions on the export to China of crude oil from the Strategic Petroleum Reserve.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5265 proposed by Senator Cruz to Amendment SA 5194.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 5265 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 54 - 46. Record Vote Number: 311.
